full_text:
GENERAL.

	All applicants seeking an Enterprise Zone Hiring Tax Credit Voucher as authorized by Sections 17053.74 and 23622.7 of the California Revenue and Taxation Code shall pay a service fee to the Community Development Department, the City’s Enterprise Zone Administrator for processing such applications.

1.name: Enterprise Zone Hiring Tax Credit Voucher Application Fees

plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE

GENERAL. (§ 21.17.1)

  GENERAL.

	All applicants seeking an Enterprise Zone Hiring Tax Credit Voucher as
authorized by Sections 17053.74 and 23622.7 of the California Revenue and
Taxation Code shall pay a service fee to the Community Development Department,
the City’s Enterprise Zone Administrator for processing such applications.
